name: node-ffmpeg-rencode-videos
description: Audit video encodings with FFprobe and generate smoke-test sample media.

scripts.check: node --check src/audit-core.js && node --check src/video-audit.js && node --check src/smoke-test.js && node --check workers/auditWorker.js && node --check services/auditService.js && node --check services/optionsService.js && node --check controllers/auditController.js && node --check controllers/optionsController.js && node --check controllers/smokeTestController.js && node --check controllers/transcodeController.js && node --check routes/audit.js && node --check routes/options.js && node --check routes/smokeTest.js && node --check routes/transcode.js && node --check public/js/app.js && node --check public/js/settings.js && node --check server.js
